metadata.dc:author: Diaz-Pérez, J L
metadata.dc:description: The immunological aspects of pemphigus vulgaris and bullous pemphigoid are reviewed in this article. In the last few years, the immunoiogical research on these blistering diseases has contributed to a better understanding of the pathogenic mechanisms of these diseases.
metadata.dc:title: Inmunología de las enfermedades ampollosas (Pénfigo vulgar y penfigoide ampolloso)
[Immunology of bullous diseases (pemphigus vulgaris and bullous pemphigus)].
